title: Write Document
description: Draft, edit, and format long-form documents including reports, articles, proposals, and technical documentation
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: draft
commands.description: Draft a new document from scratch

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The subject or topic of the document

parameters.name: outline
parameters.description: Optional array of section headings to structure the document

returns.description: Document object with title, sections array (heading + content), word count, and suggested next steps

commands.name: edit
commands.description: Edit and improve an existing document based on instructions

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The existing document content to edit

parameters.name: instructions
parameters.description: Editing instructions (e.g. 'make it more concise', 'add more data points', 'fix grammar')

returns.description: Edited document with tracked changes summary and the revised content

commands.name: format
commands.description: Convert document content to a specific output format

returns.description: Formatted document content in the requested output format
